query: Sarah has 12 apples. She gives 4 apples to her friend and eats 2 apples. How many apples does she have left?
A store sells notebooks for $3 each. If John buys 5 notebooks, how much money does he spend?
There are 24 students in a class. If they form groups of 6 students each, how many groups will there be?
A recipe calls for 2 cups of flour. If you want to make 3 times the recipe, how many cups of flour do you need?
Tom drives 60 miles per hour for 2 hours. How many miles does he travel?
A parking lot has 8 rows with 12 cars in each row. How many cars are in the parking lot?
Lisa saves $5 every week. How much money will she save in 10 weeks?
A pizza is cut into 8 slices. If 3 people each eat 2 slices, how many slices are left?
The temperature was 15°C in the morning and rose by 8°C by noon. What was the temperature at noon?
A train travels 150 miles in 3 hours. What is the average speed of the train in miles per hour?
Mark has 45 stickers. He gives away 12 stickers and buys 8 more. How many stickers does he have now?
A rectangular garden is 12 feet long and 8 feet wide. What is the area of the garden in square feet?
If it takes 15 minutes to walk 1 mile, how long will it take to walk 4 miles?
A bag contains 36 marbles. If you remove 1/4 of the marbles, how many marbles remain?
The price of a book is $18. If there's a 20% discount, what is the final price?
